scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-dynamoDB && npm run deploy-user
scripts.deploy-user: cd endpoints/user && serverless package -s production -p .serverless-production && serverless deploy -s production -p .serverless-production -v
scripts.deploy-dynamoDB: cd endpoints/dynamoDB && serverless package -s production -p .serverless-production && serverless deploy -s production -p .serverless-production -v
scripts.deploy-staging-dynamoDB: cd endpoints/dynamoDB && serverless package -s staging -p .serverless-staging && serverless deploy -s staging -p .serverless-staging -v
scripts.deploy-local: npm run deploy-local-user && npm run deploy-local-dynamoDB
scripts.deploy-local-user: cd endpoints/user && serverless package -s local -p .serverless-local && serverless deploy -s local -p .serverless-local -v
scripts.deploy-local-dynamoDB: cd endpoints/dynamoDB && serverless package -s local -p .serverless-local && serverless deploy -s local -p .serverless-local -v
